name: Flourescence Shimmer Reverb
details:
Shimmer Reverb effect with easy operationShimmering, super-bright reverb pedal sends you straight to shoegaze heaven 
Effortlessly create celestial reverb sounds
Intuitive 4-knob interface including dedicated Shimmer knob 
True bypass for ultimate signal integrity
"Built-like-a-tank" metal chassis
Runs on 9V battery or PSU-SB DC power supply (not included)
3-Year Warranty Program*
Designed and engineered in Denmark
